mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectEvtPrizeFreeGift Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ EVT_PARTCPTN_SN , PRIZE_TURN , EVT_NO , FREE_GIFT_TURN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM EVT_PRIZE_FREE_GIFT WHERE 1 = 1 AND EVT_PARTCPTN_SN = #{evtPartcptnSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND PRIZE_TURN = #{prizeTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND EVT_NO = #{evtNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FREE_GIFT_TURN = #{freeGiftTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
